document_data.name: Tulven Rayuthson
document_data.mainbody: '''Tulven Rayuthson''' was a Warlord of [[Silverymoon]] during the 10{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was said to be proud and sadistic.
document_data.History:
Tulven became Warlord in the {{YearlinkName|982}}, upon the death of his father, Warlord [[Rayuth]]. He was a sufficiently despicable ruler that the likes of War Captain [[Aeroth of Silverymoon|Aeroth]], a hero and champion of the city, left Silverymoon to live elsewhere.

Because of his abuses of power, in the {{YearlinkName|990}}, Tulven was stripped of his position by the [[High Mage (Silverymoon)|High Mage]] of Silverymoon, [[Nunivytt Threskaal]]. In order to prevent a similar incident from occurring, Nunivytt declared that the position of Warlord would only be granted during times of great need.
